titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to waive, if in the public interest, certain requirements relating to the letting of contracts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to waive competitive bidding requirements in the award of federal-aid highway construction projects performed by state transportation departments if such waiver is determined to be in the public interest.
